ygData.subject: Re: Looking for a guild list
ygData.msgSnippet: Uh, hey!  That would be us... we have the info and the links to get to what you need.  go to http://www.missvalley.com/everguide/ The click on the Guild Areas
ygData.messageBody:
Uh, hey! That would be us... we have the info and the links to get to what
you need. go to http://www.missvalley.com/everguide/ The click on the Guild
Areas button in the menu. From there click on Search the Guild Database and
then click on your server (which in this case is Bristlebane). Okay... so
go to it, this is why we made the site. :-)

Have a great weekend, God bless you.

Serna
